description.narrative: To support the large number of those fleeing have made their way into the north east of the country – some 200,000 of them to the city of Dohuk, and another 100,000 to the city of Erbil.

participating-org.narrative: The International Aid Agency of the National Council of Churches in Australia

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom

sector.code: EMERGENCY RESPONSE – WATER, SANITATION AND HYGIENE
